# Interactive graph

<style>
  * {
    font-family: sans-serif;
  }
  .tooltip {
    position: absolute;
    background-color: #fff;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    padding: 5px;
    font-size: 12px;
    pointer-events: none;
  }
  #addButton, #removeButton {
    border-radius: 6px;
    border: 0;
    background-color: #efefef;
    color: #454545;
    padding: 10px 30px;
    transition: opacity 200ms;
  }
  #addButton:hover, #removeButton:hover {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }
}
</style> 

<h3>Temporal Chart of Comment Count for Popular Subreddits</h3>
<div id="plot"></div>

<div>
  <button id="addButton">Add Subreddit</button>
  <button id="removeButton">Remove Subreddit</button>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/d3@7"></script>
<script src="scripts/myscript.js"></script>
